name: AIIntime_Agent
description: The agent can carry out email-related operations, interact with GitHub repositories, and execute internal system workflows by connecting to dedicated backend servers. It follows a deterministic reasoning process to discover available servers, explore tools, understand their schemas, execute actions with validated inputs, and communicate all results strictly via a master agent.

skills.name: Email Operations
skills.description: Perform email-related actions such as reading, sending, or managing emails by invoking tools exposed by the email backend server.

skills.name: GitHub Operations
skills.description: Interact with GitHub repositories to perform actions such as fetching issues, managing pull requests, or querying repository data using tools exposed by the GitHub backend server.

skills.name: Internal System Operations
skills.description: Execute organization-specific internal workflows and system actions by invoking tools exposed by internal backend servers.
